The itinerary above includes a round-trip flight from Sarasota to Philadelphia and a one-night stay in a private room in Brooklyn. The total cost for the trip is $1,507, which leaves you with a remaining budget of $593. This should be more than enough for any additional expenses you may have during your trip.
